review_body: Love it! I thought it would be a boring game and wondered if it was worth the price but I trusted the reviews and it actually was very good! Certainly one of my top favorite mobile games on the Play Store. It's super challenging and would keep you on your toes. The graphics and sound are amazing and...Full ReviewLove it! I thought it would be a boring game and wondered if it was worth the price but I trusted the reviews and it actually was very good! Certainly one of my top favorite mobile games on the Play Store. It's super challenging and would keep you on your toes. The graphics and sound are amazing and the story line is quite good and kinda reminds you of a life lesson.

The last comment I saw said that for Samsung Galaxy S10 Plus it does not work that properly, I have been playing this game since I have a Samsung A50 and it worked fantastic, now I have the S10 Plus and It is still working incredibly, I have no problems with controlling Leo, it's amazing

Thank you so much. Finally i can play this game on my A70 properly the screen ratio is good it now covers the whole screen the controls are working perfectly fine thank you i had to wait years before i could have my money and buy this game and play thank you for listening and fixing it

*BROKEN BUTTON/SCREEN RATIO PROBLEM SOLVED* Loved this game when I first got it. However, when installing on my S10+, none of the buttons work and the screen ratio was weird. For those with the same problem, go into: Settings >> Full Screen Apps >> Scroll down to Leo's Fortune >> Change Auto to Full...Full Review*BROKEN BUTTON/SCREEN RATIO PROBLEM SOLVED* Loved this game when I first got it. However, when installing on my S10+, none of the buttons work and the screen ratio was weird. For those with the same problem, go into: Settings >> Full Screen Apps >> Scroll down to Leo's Fortune >> Change Auto to Full Screen. After this, the buttons work much better and the screen ratio is almost perfect. Certainly much more playable/enjoyable. Hope this helps anyone else :)

Brilliant little platformer!Console quality game.Beautiful graphics.Backgrounds are stunning,you'll slow down playing just to see the intricate detail put into the levels.Fun storyline,controls are smooth & gameplay can be challenging for such simple motions but that's also what pulls you in,playing...Full ReviewBrilliant little platformer!Console quality game.Beautiful graphics.Backgrounds are stunning,you'll slow down playing just to see the intricate detail put into the levels.Fun storyline,controls are smooth & gameplay can be challenging for such simple motions but that's also what pulls you in,playing LF addictively until you master Leo's movements.LF's smart little obstacle puzzles is another feature that makes it feel like a console quality game,it's not a breeze through.

Unfortunately, without a faster way to restart, getting three stars in nearly any level is awfully tedious. You make a slight mistake due to the sloppy controls, die, respawn, then have to open the menu to restart. This game needs an option (preferably when you start a level) to automatically restar...Full ReviewUnfortunately, without a faster way to restart, getting three stars in nearly any level is awfully tedious. You make a slight mistake due to the sloppy controls, die, respawn, then have to open the menu to restart. This game needs an option (preferably when you start a level) to automatically restart on death.  If you're like me and really want to get full ranking on a level before moving on to the next, this isn't your game.

What a breath of fresh air Leo's Fortune is in the world of mobile gaming. 
The amount paid up front for this game is worth it totally. Absolutely 
beautiful, detailed worlds to move through, the graphics are awesome and 
interesting to look at. Leo the puffball is hilarious and so realistic. 
Unlim...Full ReviewWhat a breath of fresh air Leo's Fortune is in the world of mobile gaming. 
The amount paid up front for this game is worth it totally. Absolutely 
beautiful, detailed worlds to move through, the graphics are awesome and 
interesting to look at. Leo the puffball is hilarious and so realistic. 
Unlimited lives, no big deal if you die, you just pop back. My kids and I 
have had lots of laughs at all the silly ways we try to make a move and get 
killed. It sounds morbid, but bc he's a puffball it's just funny. The 
gameplay is fantastic, not boring at all and not overly difficult where it 
isn't enjoyable to play. Love his deep Spanish accent too! The best part of 
all is being able to play and enjoy a game without constantly being hounded 
to spend money! Thank You!

This game has the most gorgeous graphics from start to finish, the music 
and sound effects are also excellent. The game is a real joy to play, a 
little on the easy side if you want to rush through the twenty four levels 
taking advantage of the unlimited lives and restart points, which are never 
...Full ReviewThis game has the most gorgeous graphics from start to finish, the music 
and sound effects are also excellent. The game is a real joy to play, a 
little on the easy side if you want to rush through the twenty four levels 
taking advantage of the unlimited lives and restart points, which are never 
far from where you die, but to get all the stars and complete the game 
properly will take much longer than the couple of hours it takes to rush 
through. The game also has a really nice storyline which plays out between 
the levels, again with terrific graphics, which are in black and white. The 
puzzles are fairly easy, but still good fun to work out. All in all, a 
brilliant and clever platform game, and one of the best I have ever 
played... As a note to the developers of Leo's Fortune, I would suggest 
lives were not infinite, but limited at the start of each level with extra 
lives earned by collecting practically everything to be found in the level. 
The puzzles could be harder and more devious, requiring a bit more effort 
to work them out, and maybe a load of hidden extras requiring a lot more 
searching, like in the Donkey Kong games. One more thing, if you are not 
already doing so, PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE make either another Leo game, or 
something similar... 9.95 / 10

Prettiest platformer on Android This traditional style side-scrolling platformer boasts gorgeous pre-rendered graphics in the vein the classic Donkey Kong Country games. It also benefits from creative level designs that blend elements of DKC, Sonic The Hedgehog, as well as elegantly implemented puzzles. But perhaps it's greatest a...Full ReviewThis traditional style side-scrolling platformer boasts gorgeous pre-rendered graphics in the vein the classic Donkey Kong Country games. It also benefits from creative level designs that blend elements of DKC, Sonic The Hedgehog, as well as elegantly implemented puzzles. But perhaps it's greatest achievement is its innovative controls. There are no fixed positions for on screen buttons. This eliminates the usual frustrations associated with playing this type of game on a touch screen.

Mobile gaming breakthrough This game is stunning, visually breathtaking, the voice acting is velvety smooth and the music is intoxicating. That's before we get to gameplay. You are Leo who is looking for his fortune. Hence the name Leo's Fortune to do this you have to navigate various settings each with it's own amazing artwork (the fire animation is superb). Buy this game now you are missing out if you don't own it. The developer has worked hard and it shows.

Great game with some minor short comings. Leo's Fortune is the representation of the perfection of a platformer. Great graphics, excellent controls, and a well constructed level design show off a great amount of polish.  On the downside is the incredible shortness. The game can be completed between 2 or 3 hours. Those minutes are a great ex...Full ReviewLeo's Fortune is the representation of the perfection of a platformer. Great graphics, excellent controls, and a well constructed level design show off a great amount of polish.  On the downside is the incredible shortness. The game can be completed between 2 or 3 hours. Those minutes are a great experience, but don't expect longevity in its 20 levels. Replay value is in acquiring additional stars which is greatly difficult for some levels.

One of the best games on Android. The puzzles are just challenging enough to make you think and still be fun, the narration is superb (I love his very-fitting voice), the music is excellent, the graphics are something to behold, the game is smooth as can be on my Note 4, and the story is compelling and interesting. My only complaint...Full ReviewThe puzzles are just challenging enough to make you think and still be fun, the narration is superb (I love his very-fitting voice), the music is excellent, the graphics are something to behold, the game is smooth as can be on my Note 4, and the story is compelling and interesting. My only complaint is how short the game is. Is it worth the 99 cents I paid for it? Absolutely. Is it worth five bucks? Not to me. If it was a longer game, it'd be a definite yes. I hope they add more levels.

Fun, beautiful game with derpy controls Loved this game. It was beautiful and inventive. Lovely scenery and music, interesting story, and spot on voice acting. It was beautiful and inventive. Lovely scenery and music, interesting story, and spot on voice acting. Otherwise a wonderful game!

The Perfect Mobile Game 1337 & Senri have created something special here. Leo's Fortune is a AAA platformer that feels like it was made for touch screen devices, and nothing was really sacrificed to accomplish this.  The story is told through Leo's mutterings to himself during gameplay and a few short cut scenes between th...Full Review1337 & Senri have created something special here. Leo's Fortune is a AAA platformer that feels like it was made for touch screen devices, and nothing was really sacrificed to accomplish this.  The story is told through Leo's mutterings to himself during gameplay and a few short cut scenes between the four sections of the game. The developers did a good job of crafting an immersive and intriguing story without it getting in the way of the gameplay too much. Something essential for mobile gaming.  The game is easy to pick up and play by anyone, and has no learning curves. I never felt frustrated by the controls, and the level design is smart and intuitive. You get the hang of gliding through the gorgeous environments fairly quickly.  I really can't say enough good things about this game. If you're looking for a fun, modern platformer for your phone and tablet, I can't recommend this highly enough.

I wish the play store had more platformers as great as this.

Overall: fun for a few hours, tedium thereafter.

It's great. Unique puzzle platformer with its own style. Well-presented story. More than you'd expect from this type of game. Likeable protagonist. Works well with touch controls. Fortunately, there are many checkpoints, so this minor complaint doesn't aggravate. Everything else about the game is very good. Easily 5 stars.

Good game, frustrating controls Great game design and levels. Just wish the controls were more consistent.  Sometimes Leo will fly, other times crawl.  Sometimes leaps high, other times just hops.  Motion indicators show full throttle in both cases.

Wonderful This game looks and sounds beautiful. The story is okay, and the controls can get wonky (which has probably more to do with my tablet or the state of my hands than the game) but the art, music, and sound effects are incredible. A feast for the eyes and ears.

Tons of fun Perfect gameplay and great visuals. Didn't expect it to be so polished. Love the physics puzzles and play games integration, all without having a billion microtransactions. Please add more levels!

Great game Superb game, beautifully designed with a great control system and story line. Looks really nice on my Samsung galaxy tab s 10.5. Only slight gripe is that it's a bit short and so would be great if the developer extended it.

Good Storyline and Visuals Upon opening the app, it's easy to see why the game is normally $5 dollars. Leo's Fortune is a very traditional type of game in the sense that there is a problem in the beginning and the character sets out on a journey to fix it. Good game, but not yet amazing. Good buy for the Play Story Holiday Sa...Full ReviewUpon opening the app, it's easy to see why the game is normally $5 dollars. Leo's Fortune is a very traditional type of game in the sense that there is a problem in the beginning and the character sets out on a journey to fix it. Good game, but not yet amazing. Good buy for the Play Story Holiday Sale!
I will always love this game. This was literally the only thing I could do together with my kids when I was in bed sick for 6 months, and I'll never forget that.
Fun game ,great graphics,but i am stuck!!!!! I can't get leo past the mines. He will not jump high enough out of th water to safety   and get me to the next step. next

Apples and oranges let's compare... they're both sweet roughly the same 
size. Taste great however one you have to peel and the other has a core. 
Yep apples and oranges. 🤔

Perfect tablet game Lovely world and graphics, good voice acting and story, the puzzles are sublime and the difficulty increases as the game progresses. The music is a delight and the controls are excellent. Can't fault this game in any way.

Beautiful to behold One of the nicest looking and well thought games. Leo has a great personality and sense of humor too. Levels can be very difficult though.. I can overlook that ,as this is a brilliant game.

author_name: A Chair That Was Thrown By Yoongi
review_body: Refund Is there I way I can get a refund? My little cousin got ahold of my phone and bought this game. I would sincerely appreciate it. Thank you. 😊

You don't have to be a gamer to love this I've never understood why people get hooked on games... any game at all. I'm just not that guy so I don't need to say that kids hate my phone cos i don't even have candy crush. So I walked into an apple store and played the game on one of their demo phones while I waited for a technician and I just ...Full ReviewI've never understood why people get hooked on games... any game at all. I'm just not that guy so I don't need to say that kids hate my phone cos i don't even have candy crush. So I walked into an apple store and played the game on one of their demo phones while I waited for a technician and I just loved it. I recommend it, something to enjoy your past time
5 stars is an understatement. I LOVE THIS SO MUCH... GAME OF THE YEAR!!!!! Wow wow wow So happy i bought this.  On note 4s qhd screen it looks out of this world

Very good game It's been awhile since I've played a game this good. Gameplay is fun and challenging. Graphics are amazing. The only thing I don't like about the game, is that there is no mute button. That's the only thing I don't like.

I actually really enjoyed this game. They lost two stars for not bothering to give you a mute option. I really can't imagine why they would do that. The times to complete levels in order to get a star are on the short side.

a treat very well made game. unique gameplay only problem is that controls are not adjustable. it feels odd for me to control direction with left thumb I realized I played better with the reverse configuration. also the left right control's sensitivity is not adjustable

I expected too much based on its reviews I don't know, maybe my threshold for puzzle games have gone way up after after so many years of playing. This game is just mediocre in terms of difficulty. The graphics is stellar though. While the music is okay, the tracks are very short. This game is nowhere near as good as the ones like : Machina...Full ReviewI don't know, maybe my threshold for puzzle games have gone way up after after so many years of playing. This game is just mediocre in terms of difficulty. The graphics is stellar though. While the music is okay, the tracks are very short. This game is nowhere near as good as the ones like : Machinarium, Limbo, The Room etc(these are vastly superior). I feel like 5 bucks is too much money to spend on this one. I wish if I could get my money back.
It's good The only reason i put 2 stars its because there are no more levels, i liked the game, but 5$ for only 20levels its not serious ! Add more levels !!!
Really really fun!! Great artwork! Working smooth on my nexus 6. It gets a little frustrating when you try to get all three stars but doesn't take away from the fun!!

A game to win after several retries... This is a fantastic, console quality game on a mobile. The graphics are great and stunning. The music and effects are awesome too. This game would need a controller for better maneuverability. The onscreen controls are not consistent and it frustrates you most of the times (by not giving you the swi...Full ReviewThis is a fantastic, console quality game on a mobile. The graphics are great and stunning. The music and effects are awesome too. This game would need a controller for better maneuverability. The onscreen controls are not consistent and it frustrates you most of the times (by not giving you the swing you expecting). This game requires several retries to finish them with a perfect score. I have given up trying to win the bonus levels, they are extremely difficult. And the ACT 3 and 4 have high level of difficulty in completing within the time-frame and without losing lives. Despite it, it deserves a 5*

Beautiful graphics. Grasping Storyline. Addictive Game play. A must have for all adventure games enthusiasts. It's frustratingly addictive! 😍😍😍😍❤❤....by the way, please release an update. I've have reached a fever pitch after the twenty levels!

Loved it! Great game. I loved the story and I thought the mistranslations to English actually added something to the story. For example, I don't know what exactly a slumbershadow is, but I like the sound of it. Thanks!

Compatibility issues Although I could not get this game to work properly on my tablet without force closing and losing my progress, the developer did try to resolve my issue and ultimately ended up refunding me.  Much better customer service than other apps that I have  ran into problems with. The game itself is super f...Full ReviewAlthough I could not get this game to work properly on my tablet without force closing and losing my progress, the developer did try to resolve my issue and ultimately ended up refunding me.  Much better customer service than other apps that I have  ran into problems with. The game itself is super fun, and it is a shame I couldn't save my  progress,  because I would love to play through it!

Great time waster. This app was very fun in my eyes, I thought it was a cute idea, and a very fun little puzzle platformer,  the scenery was bright, saturated and the sound really brought a sense of atmosphere to the game. The mini games and story was fun, although I would have liked it if this game had a level editor...Full ReviewThis app was very fun in my eyes, I thought it was a cute idea, and a very fun little puzzle platformer,  the scenery was bright, saturated and the sound really brought a sense of atmosphere to the game. The mini games and story was fun, although I would have liked it if this game had a level editor of sorts to be able to share with friends. Overall very happy with this game and I reccommend it to anyone with a few bucks on hand!

Lovely. The music is soothing, the gameplay after some initial getting used to, is consistent, and the graphics are top notch. Such high quality that buyer's remorse is non-existent. Great job to all the artists and developers who made this possible.

A platformer brought to a touch device. Previously unheard of. I am deeply impressed. As an addition, the music, gameplay, graphics and immersion (not to mention the story) are all superb and enchanting. A no brainer, and a contestant for the hall of fame of Best Android Game of All Time. 5/5

Re-reviewing this game. It's paid for so there really isn't an excuse that it's not compatible with the new longer smartphones. Just like the Galaxy S10 issue, my game is stretched. The graphics are much worse and the on screen buttons dont work. Not only that, but the game has a big black bar cut o...Full ReviewRe-reviewing this game. It's paid for so there really isn't an excuse that it's not compatible with the new longer smartphones. Just like the Galaxy S10 issue, my game is stretched. The graphics are much worse and the on screen buttons dont work. Not only that, but the game has a big black bar cut off on the right side of the screen. Please fix for 5 star rating.

Beautiful Game, Bad Controls I fell in love with the game after the first level; beautiful graphics that draw you in with an awesome soundtrack to match! However, I'm only going to give it 4 instead of 5 stars due to the controls. My death rate wouldn't be so bad if the controls weren't so horrible at times. Especially when wan...Full ReviewI fell in love with the game after the first level; beautiful graphics that draw you in with an awesome soundtrack to match! However, I'm only going to give it 4 instead of 5 stars due to the controls. My death rate wouldn't be so bad if the controls weren't so horrible at times. Especially when wanting Leo to float. Sometimes he'll just drop like a stone, while other times he won't float at all. Other than the controls and wishing it was longer, the game is very addicting!

The best Leo's fortune is easily the best mobile game I have ever played, from the amazing graphics and fluid anamations to the wonderful voice acting. It was worth every penny. I would gladly pay three times the cost for a "Leo's fortune 2." It has a slightly sentemental story line along with "World of Goo....Full ReviewLeo's fortune is easily the best mobile game I have ever played, from the amazing graphics and fluid anamations to the wonderful voice acting. It was worth every penny. I would gladly pay three times the cost for a "Leo's fortune 2." It has a slightly sentemental story line along with "World of Goo."
Fun bit gets boring It's a fun game but it does get boring after a while. Started playing something else just cause I got bored with it.

Beautiful and addicting I'm very picky when it comes to video game quality. The visuals are superb. The audio is superb. The game play is very interactive and the controls are very responsive. The storyline adds a tasteful degree of depth that keeps your attention. I would have paid twice as much as I did for it.
Long, bland levels full of spikes. No enemies, always the same scenery. Very repetitive and boring.
Absolutely in love This game feels really fresh,  fun and easy to pick up. Worth every cent. Edit : just finished the game and I haven't changed opinion about the game, one hell of a masterpiece
Fantastic! Doesn't get any better than this! Well worth the money. Matter of fact I'd say a steal! Buy it. Play it. It just keeps getting better as you go.
Download The download is paused and it won't start again, WiFi and nothing. Make a game that you won't be able to play because it doesn't go itself, it kinda stupid, anyway to start it again?

Needs a mute button Great app. The controls are intuitive and original however I dislike that I'm required to change my master media volume to play in silence. Most other games give you an option to disable the sounds but this one does not

Fun game, great graphics. Great gameplay, intuitive controls, and excellent graphics. You need a phone with horsepower, though. Tried to get my dad to try it on his older droid and it was pretty laggy.

Frustrating Graphics are great and controls are innovative but the game play it's frustrating. It's very difficult to control the character and getting in time for a star takes the fun out of the game completely. Don't feel like playing again. I want my money back.
BROKEN! BROKEN.  Message stating looking for resources to download. Never got a chance to even try the game. A waste of 2.99. Oh well.

I loved it I already beat the game and now I'm on hardcore mode at the end Matilda stole the gold and all that time he thought it was his uncle his cousin and his aunt but it wasn't I loved level 20 it is so fun I relly wish you could make a Matildas fortune

Super fun If this was a fake review I would tell you how this game will love you long time. But since this is the real deal I will say if it wasn't for this game I would never survive this holiday hell

What an awesome game. Felt like an obligation to come and give it 5 stars. Great graphics even though it's really light, good controls, variety, scenarios, puzzles, repeatability, story.. This one's got the hole package. I wish more games follow this one.
Can't stop! I always saw people play this game and I never pay for games but I just had to try it. Best 2.99 I've spent in a while. Totally a keeper!

real fun Great game play.. Funny plot.. Great graphics and sounds.. The challenges are just right and the frustration level is low because when you tackle a hardship you stay on it and not taken too far back
Great Game, Very entertaining! Excellent graphics, challenging levels! My only gripe is that the intro should only display the first time you play the app, not every time it loads
Controls ruined it for me Game looks great but I found even the easiest levels difficult because of the controls.  Kinda feel like I wasted money cause I can barely stand to play the game.
Really good graphics The graphics are good but i wish the controls could be switched,  I'm right handed and i feel like it's more for a lefty, I'd give a full blown 5 stars if this was fixed

Well worth the price 79p It's an enjoyable game with a lovely feel to it. The control format is frustrating and that's my main problem with this, it's the games downfall,  but worth the cheap purchase.
really good I really like this app and Leo is really cute! especially when he puffes up I dont think it should be 3 pounds though  maybe 2 pounds would have been better

Poor controls The level design is decent, the mechanics are fun and the graphics are really nice but the controls aren't very good. I have tried both the touch and button controls and find it very difficult to achieve the precision that is often required. I would recommend buying it on PS4 instead. That's what I'...Full ReviewThe level design is decent, the mechanics are fun and the graphics are really nice but the controls aren't very good. I have tried both the touch and button controls and find it very difficult to achieve the precision that is often required. I would recommend buying it on PS4 instead. That's what I'll be doing.
Awesome Game! ! I'm loving this game! ! It kills me when I get a level I can't pass, then I can't put the game down cause I've got to dominate that level! ! I could play this game 24 hours a day.

Data usage? Installed this, then a few weeks later first played it. Then a notification pops up saying it had finished downloading... And a massive chunk of my monthly mobile data was used up, at the start of the month. Thanks so much.  And, no, I did NOT go in and change the default to allow cellular data - th...Full ReviewInstalled this, then a few weeks later first played it. Then a notification pops up saying it had finished downloading... And a massive chunk of my monthly mobile data was used up, at the start of the month. Thanks so much.  And, no, I did NOT go in and change the default to allow cellular data - this is exactly what I do NOT do.

Error downloading! (Note 4) I tried to download it many times but it Downloads half way and gets cancelled.....I'm fed up of this.... please don't try to say it's a problem in my Internet connection... it works just fine.....
Darren Brock This game is amazing. Its so clever and well thought out with mechanical puzzles and slick graphics. Not many platform games that top this one. I hope they make another one to follow

Doesn't work properly on the Droid Turbo None of the buttons work properly on the Droid Turbo. I can hit some of the buttons, but it usually takes touching a random part of the screen. Seems to not like the increased resolution of the Turbo.

Standard Setter I've heard much about this game and both my wife and I bought it.   It's a gorgeous game for mobile standards and the art style is amazing.   I'm actually surprised this isn't a PSN, Live or Steam indie title as its right up there with the best of them.   Platforming mechanics with influence from So...Full ReviewI've heard much about this game and both my wife and I bought it.   It's a gorgeous game for mobile standards and the art style is amazing.   I'm actually surprised this isn't a PSN, Live or Steam indie title as its right up there with the best of them.   Platforming mechanics with influence from Sonic and games like Tales From Space and light puzzle mechanics.
Great It's fun and challenging. It is fun little time waster with a little frustration to go with it. The only thing I dislike is the controls are little difficult and awkward.

Way too difficult... For the touch screen. Love the mechanics love the graphic design. Too bad the stages get prohibitively difficult on a touch screen device. Yes, a controller is better suited here.

Not impressed Everytime I went to go open all It does is black screen. And it says in my top bar. "Looking for resources" waste of time and money. I want a refund. Update* still wont let me play keeps blac screening please help

Fun for awhile I'll start by saying that this game is worth the money. The graphics are great, it has a decent story, and the gameplay is fun. I'm only giving it four stars though because there is hardly any replay value. You can unlock levels meant to continue to challenge you, but there are only a few of those. ...Full ReviewI'll start by saying that this game is worth the money. The graphics are great, it has a decent story, and the gameplay is fun. I'm only giving it four stars though because there is hardly any replay value. You can unlock levels meant to continue to challenge you, but there are only a few of those. After you beat the game, that's pretty much it, and you'll get so hooked on this game it'll be done before you know it. It would be great if they added more content to it.

Decent game At first it was kind of boring, but after maybe an hour and a half it started to get much better. The graphics are pretty cool, and it's got a nice little story. Definitely worth a playthru.

Great game A beautiful looking, simple but challenging platformer. The stars and cogs keep me coming back for more. You can easily tell that the creators poured some love into this game. I would highly recommend it.

Great game but can't continue - updated *Update: Wrote the developers about the problem and got a reasonably quick response. Uninstalling and reinstalling did the trick, though I did lose my data. No big deal - had fun rebuilding it. The reviews say it all This game is outstanding! Graphics are incredible, controls are easy and game play is intuitive but still challenging. Well worth the money. I don't buy many games but I'm glad I purchased this one.
A magical world dont get it twisted, this game isnt only for kids - PC veteran here and I'm loving this!
Gorgeous graphics with amazing game play With just one complain, how do I turn off the music? I have bring down media volume every time I play this game.
What a story! I really love this game, is great. The graphics are amazing and the way that the environment looks, but what really got hooked was the story. Definitely recommend anyone to play!
Great atmosphere! A beautifully designed game with astonishing atmosphere, great graphics and the music is just lovely.  It takes some time to get used to the controls and their physics.
Beautiful, but... The touch controls are not sensitive enough. Especially jumping does not respond to fast swipes, only slow ones
Awesome! I've always wanted to buy this game but it was a bit too expensive. Now that it's on sale, I had to buy it no matter what. 5 stars! Keep up the good job, dev!
Such a nice game and with a good storyline...as well great challenges... and graphics...although there should have been some sorts of power ups and henchmen enemies for us to dodge or fight.
Brought the game and all i can see is a black screen with music in background. This game is not working on nexus 6p running nougat. All we can see is a black screen. Please fix it.
Beautiful and fun Probably the only mobile game I play with the volume on... Leo's Gallic grunts of triumph make me chuckle every time. Fun, nicely made...worth it.
Great graphics, semi-engaging gameplay Tremendous graphics and an interesting story. Good variety in problems to solve. I can't figure out why I'm not compelled to play more often.
Very addictive Only gripe is got can't turn off sound so I can't listen to music while playing

Still having Compatibility issues with Android Nougat, the game black screens and then crashes every time. The game can load sometimes (very rarely) but doesn't fit the screen, I really would love to play this game.
Download paused issue fix For those facing the "download paused" issue, uninstall the game and then re-install it from the PlayStore. Worked fine for me after that.
Crashes right after installation on Galaxy Tab 8.9 But worked fine on other devices. Great fun game. My kid loved it and so did my wife.
Great Game Got it on sale. A few graphics glitches but descent story.
Leo's Fortune I like this game more than anything I've seen in a long time. It's visually stunning. It makes my putter flutter and my thing swing.

A wonderful, beautiful little game In a world saturated with freemium filth its so refreshing to see a lovely game that you pay for and then play it, as it used to be. The graphics, voices and music is outstanding and the furry ball is adorable. Good job, you deserve my money!
No doubt Un compromised to give rating 5 even I buy it for 190

Best mobile gaming experience available This game truly sets the mobile gaming benchmark for me. Slick visuals, a great main character and awesomely responsive controls. Switch to the button option for the best experience. The only game so far that I feel makes my note 4 take the brakes off. But this will look amazing on any device that c...Full ReviewThis game truly sets the mobile gaming benchmark for me. Slick visuals, a great main character and awesomely responsive controls. Switch to the button option for the best experience. The only game so far that I feel makes my note 4 take the brakes off. But this will look amazing on any device that can run it happily.

Challenging This game was flawless but some things needs to be changed. The buttons (left and right) are too small because my figures move on the screen with the excitement. The time given to finish a each level is too little. These levels need to handled with caution. Times like 4-6 minutes will be appreciated...Full ReviewThis game was flawless but some things needs to be changed. The buttons (left and right) are too small because my figures move on the screen with the excitement. The time given to finish a each level is too little. These levels need to handled with caution. Times like 4-6 minutes will be appreciated not 2.

Flawless on Shield Tablet What can I say, thoroughly enjoyed playing through, been out of gaming a while but this was great, will replay for sure fir better scores. Hooked up to the TV, and sat back with my controller, beautiful graphics

I am very sceptical about every game and i am not the one too buy one but it worth it! At first I didn't know what was that furry little thing on the screen but when i start playing I enjoyed every minute of the game.

One of the best games I've played, ever. I was pleasantly surprised by how enjoyable and beautiful this game is. Bought it on sale after reading the review saying how good the game is, but I never thought I would be playing it this much. One of the best purchases of game app I've ever made. Thanks to the developer for creating such a great...Full ReviewI was pleasantly surprised by how enjoyable and beautiful this game is. Bought it on sale after reading the review saying how good the game is, but I never thought I would be playing it this much. One of the best purchases of game app I've ever made. Thanks to the developer for creating such a great game, with no in-app purchases which is a plus point. Would highly recommend it!
Creative and satisfying Each level adds either a new obstacle or a layer of difficulty on the last. There was clearly a lot of care put into developing this game.

Not a bad game, but not amazing either. After playing through the campaign, I have decided to lower my review score. The controls lack precision and sometimes don't work. The story didn't interest me at all. Also on one of the levels, the game crashed my phone so I had to restart it. Probably a one off but still concerning. I still think ...Full ReviewAfter playing through the campaign, I have decided to lower my review score. The controls lack precision and sometimes don't work. The story didn't interest me at all. Also on one of the levels, the game crashed my phone so I had to restart it. Probably a one off but still concerning. I still think this game is worth a play, but preferably when it is on sale.
The hype is very real This game is exactly as advertised and bragged about, awesome story, great game play, really nice fluidity and graphics. 5 stars plus!
Wow! I don't usually play mobile games but this one's is definitely a winner. I can't wait to see what else this studio makes in the future.

It's awesome It's an amazing game with amazing graphics and very good quality voice acting, and good puzzles. One thing I would appreciate though is if it would save instead of when I leave the game I have to restart the level. Otherwise recommend 10/10
Challenging enough to keep you interested This game tests your awareness and precision. My only gripe is that at times the scenes are to dark to see the dangers.
Wasnt a fun game I wanted a refund but it was too late

Only played a bit, but... beautiful and runs smooth as can be in game. Why four stars only you ask. The achievement's menu is a little stuttery with scrolling and would like to see a exit button to close the game down entirely after use. Please fix I love this game. Finished all the levels. But i accidently uninstalled it. So when i re installed it. I cant even get to the main menu before its crashes on me! Unistalled and reinstalled several times. Please fix!!!!!!

Would recommend to others.  Awesome game with a bit of a back story to the game, laced with mystery. My two biggest problems was that it takes only a day to complete the entire game, and it seems pricy, $3 seems more reasonable.

Worth the price!! You could completely rule out any skepticism regarding the purchase of this game. The gameplay on my Galaxy S6 is too good and the rendered graphic quality  left me in complete awe of the devs. Kudos!
I hate it Because act 4 dosent work and I want my money back! Fraud!
So much fun ..im never addicted to any android games since angry bird n piano tiles, but this one is so amusing to play.

Cool game with completely unreasonable battery usage First downloaded on a one plus one and played for 10 minutes. an hour later and my battery had dropped had 50% (even though i had closed the app properly). Verified across moto g, and a touchpad running android. I don't know why it needs to run in background after i quit the game, but no bueno
Superb Game Awesome story, graphics but little difficult. It increases stress rather than relieving stress. I face problems with Google play achievements.
Loved the game It seemed short tho. I wish there were more levels, more deception and betrayal. I would love it so much more!
It's like a weird mixture of Zoombinis and Sonic. The graphics are wonderful and beautiful. Very easy to control, but it's a short game and the story line isn't all that interesting.

Engrossing gameplay and amazing graphics. Very exciting and detailed worlds with amazing colours. The game is definitely worth its price tag ($3.49 CAD on sale) and is something that should be tried by anyone. Great mobile game.

Beautiful game This is the best game I've played for a long time, on any platform.   Graphically it looks stunning, the story is good, but most importantly the gameplay is fantastic and the difficulty curve is just about right.  The challenge of doing rack level without losing a life also adds good replayability .

Excellent graphics and challenging Not every game is as like as it is. Graphics is good. Not addicted type! That's a major plus point. And little bit tricky which get you excited to solve those puzzle more and more. Overall nice game.

Best Adventure themed game. The concept is very good, loved playing it. Loved the character. Wish the game was lengthy, as I was able to complete it in only 5 hours :(. Hope you release same kind of games.  👍
Love it. Only thing i dont like is that i cant enable the buttons use in my Ascend Mate 7... Everything else is perfect...great story. Wondeful graphics!! :)
Good but not worth the money Is don't have much levels and after you finished the game you don't really want to play it again. The story is great but in the end it is just not worth the buy

This game is awesome Very good graphics. Excelente environment.  Good story, good puzzles wao very impressed with this game. I recommend, it's smooth, no lags.. depend of your device of course, but it's very easy to play , awesome game
Dont waste your money Yes it does have nice graphics and sound, but the controls are very annoying.

Amazing! Great user interface, controls aren't complex, and especially great background design on each levels. Best parts are the challenges to get the 3 stars. In short, worth the pay and fun story line.

Excellent graphics. This game is fun to play and a good way to pass the time while on the subway but it desperately needs an option to turn off, or at the very least, reduce the in-game music and SFX. It's really annoying that I can't listen to my music while playing.
A fun game Needs more levels and a little better controls. Love solving new puzzles getting a higher score on every level not so much. Still a great game
Controls are the enemy I would like to love this game, but I just cannot get used to the controls. Why there is no option to switch the controls to opposite sides?

Issue with controller The controller doesn't work properly, 4 times on 5 you die because controller doesn't respond properly to swipe or stop working in the middle of a movement, cancelling it. Very frustrating. Should be fixed.

Great game. The visuals are great, level design is interesting, challenge is fair, overall I'm having a great time. I really like that Leo can touch spikes lightly without dying. That said I'd have preferred to play it on PC with keyboard or gamepad and a less zoomed in camera. I've often died simply because ca...Full ReviewThe visuals are great, level design is interesting, challenge is fair, overall I'm having a great time. I really like that Leo can touch spikes lightly without dying. That said I'd have preferred to play it on PC with keyboard or gamepad and a less zoomed in camera. I've often died simply because camera doesn't allow me to react to new dangers as I see them and instead I have to rely on memorisation, which is probably fine for this type of game, but a bit more leeway to react would have been nice.

Beautiful game, lovely story to go with it. Super cute game. I'm even picky about the quality of games I play and this one is refreshingly clean and the graphics are very nice.  Runs smoothly on my Galaxy S5. Give it a try!
Awesome This is one of the best mobile games I have ever played. If you are hesitant about paying for this game, let me tell you, it is worth it.

Brilliant Beautiful visuals, good music & sounds, amazing controls, and most importantly it runs extremely smoothly. The excellent Play Games integration is a big cherry on top. Please continue making awesome games.

The game is great as far as playing it. The graphics are wonderful. I'm taking away a star because  there's now button to turn off or turn down the audio. That's insane. Most low quality games have this option. This game costs actual money. There should be some sort of sound option. I don't like hav...Full ReviewThe game is great as far as playing it. The graphics are wonderful. I'm taking away a star because  there's now button to turn off or turn down the audio. That's insane. Most low quality games have this option. This game costs actual money. There should be some sort of sound option. I don't like having to adjust my phone's sound for one game.  I took away two stars because I can't save my place on the game. Like most "games" today, whoever programmed this thing does not know how to program in a "save game" routine.  So, you have to keep redoing the same, boring, stupid parts that are just exhausting.  Perhaps whoever coded this could consult with someone like the folks who wrote Skyrim so they can lear...Full ReviewLike most "games" today, whoever programmed this thing does not know how to program in a "save game" routine.  So, you have to keep redoing the same, boring, stupid parts that are just exhausting.  Perhaps whoever coded this could consult with someone like the folks who wrote Skyrim so they can learn how to code save routines.  This game is nauseatingly repetitious at best.  It's perfect for people who aren't familiar with how really professionally coded games are written, but it doesn't fly with me.  I've long held that most game developers today have a secret disdain for their players and this game only fortifies that belief for me.  This game is a great example of how we in the U.S. have become accepting of slip shod quality and just don't care anymore.

Great game. Worth the $5.  As everyone says the graphics are awesome. Really gorgeous looking levels and character model that show off the capability of mobile devices. When you can have a game look this good and still run @ close to 60 FPS, you have a good mobile game.   The soundtrack fits and add...Full ReviewGreat game. Worth the $5.  As everyone says the graphics are awesome. Really gorgeous looking levels and character model that show off the capability of mobile devices. When you can have a game look this good and still run @ close to 60 FPS, you have a good mobile game.   The soundtrack fits and adds depth. At no point have I felt annoyed by the soundtrack and muted the game so I could listen to my music while playing.    Gameplay is solid. At the games core Leo's Fortune is a physics based platformer with puzzles thrown in. Feels like Sonic the Hedgehog and World of Goo mixed together (in a good way). This is a game that could only exist as a mobile game and I like how the developers took advantage of this fact rather than trying to make the game something that would have been better if it was on PC.  Generous checkpoint system and faster paced gameplay are great for casual players. Global score (level time) and completion stars add replay value for purist and speed-runners.    Cons?  -24 levels @ 5 to 6 minutes each (1st playthrough) makes for a shorter game.  -Puzzles not hard enough? True. But this is a speed-running game. -Requires full attention and both hands
Great Game Smooth fluid gameplay is a huge plus.  This is one of the few games out there where the developers actually cared about making it play well.

Challenging with great graphics I'm not much of a "phone gamer." But on a recent trip to Italy, my son ( prime reviewer) suggested this game to pass the time on the numerous flights and hotel room down time. I must admit,  I was impressed by the level of graphics and problem solving. Of course I died exponentially more than my son...Full ReviewI'm not much of a "phone gamer." But on a recent trip to Italy, my son ( prime reviewer) suggested this game to pass the time on the numerous flights and hotel room down time. I must admit,  I was impressed by the level of graphics and problem solving. Of course I died exponentially more than my son but I was glad there were numerous save points throughout each level. Very well done game!

What a game. Simple yet challenging and good looking to! From great graphics to smooth play this game sets the mark. The puzzles are fun and challenging but workable with a little thought. The only complaint is the controls. Big thumbs and little screens don't mix, even on my nexus 5 I found my thumb in the way more times then I can count. Other then that...Full ReviewFrom great graphics to smooth play this game sets the mark. The puzzles are fun and challenging but workable with a little thought. The only complaint is the controls. Big thumbs and little screens don't mix, even on my nexus 5 I found my thumb in the way more times then I can count. Other then that I love the game and cannot wait to complete it. Oh and did I say there was a little story in there :) its not much but really moves things along.

Brilliant BUT... ...it doesn't last very long. This game has several levels but I completed the whole game in just a few hours.  For game play and graphics it's still worth the money as its fun and very well made. Graphics are brilliant on my Samsung Tablet. However, now that I have completed the levels it's kinda g...Full Review...it doesn't last very long. This game has several levels but I completed the whole game in just a few hours.  For game play and graphics it's still worth the money as its fun and very well made. Graphics are brilliant on my Samsung Tablet. However, now that I have completed the levels it's kinda game over... There are some personal bests and stars to achive but it'll be an unused game app unless they update with more game play.

Just misses This is a game that's a little more challenging than fun. No doubt it is artistically beautiful but I'm not sure it's worth the frustration at certain levels, so it just misses out on that "addictive" quality that makes a good (paid) game great. This version also does not save your in-level progress...Full ReviewThis is a game that's a little more challenging than fun. No doubt it is artistically beautiful but I'm not sure it's worth the frustration at certain levels, so it just misses out on that "addictive" quality that makes a good (paid) game great. This version also does not save your in-level progress (HTC 1M8) which would be a nice bug fix.

Amazing! I can't believe this is a mobile game. Until now, I felt only puzzle, board, and card games could work well on Android. Then I stumbled across this gem! Normally, I don't find it worthwhile to pay more than 1 or 2 bucks for a decent mobile game, but $4.99 for this game is a steal! The graphics are i...Full ReviewI can't believe this is a mobile game. Until now, I felt only puzzle, board, and card games could work well on Android. Then I stumbled across this gem! Normally, I don't find it worthwhile to pay more than 1 or 2 bucks for a decent mobile game, but $4.99 for this game is a steal! The graphics are incredible, on par with HD PS3 or XBOX 360.  The soundtrack is beautiful and ambient. The controls are tight and smooth. The game is challenging but fair. This is the most impressive mobile game I've ever played!!

Brilliant. Polished, fun, and pretty. This is a superb game, especially when compared to most other mobile games. The art style is great and is a nice showcase for a high res display, the music fits well and is catchy enough to stick in my head, and the levels are a good challenge. Physics based platforming along the lines of Rayman mee...Full ReviewThis is a superb game, especially when compared to most other mobile games. The art style is great and is a nice showcase for a high res display, the music fits well and is catchy enough to stick in my head, and the levels are a good challenge. Physics based platforming along the lines of Rayman meets Limbo, I couldn't ask for much more. Even the touch screen controls work very well.

What a fantastic game. I'm not a gamer, but I seen stellar reviews and had to install and man I wasn't disappointed. First: brilliant story and ending. Showed a lot of empathy for Leo especially at the end (which came to soon). Graphics, controls all 100%. Developer makes full use of Play Games which means cloud save - ep...Full ReviewI'm not a gamer, but I seen stellar reviews and had to install and man I wasn't disappointed. First: brilliant story and ending. Showed a lot of empathy for Leo especially at the end (which came to soon). Graphics, controls all 100%. Developer makes full use of Play Games which means cloud save - epicness. Definitely worth the €5!

I can't believe this is a mobile game. Lush graphics, awesome sound effects and beautiful fluid game play. I held off buying it for a couple of days as thought it can't be the good, but it is. Fantastic game. If only the play store was full of this kind of game and not countless mediocre apple app ripoffs or games about leg hair removal ...Full ReviewLush graphics, awesome sound effects and beautiful fluid game play. I held off buying it for a couple of days as thought it can't be the good, but it is. Fantastic game. If only the play store was full of this kind of game and not countless mediocre apple app ripoffs or games about leg hair removal of whatever the latest shitey fad is, I'd be a much happier android fan. Great work devs. Keep it up.

Brilliant When I first opened the game I could tell that it was going to be good. I started playing the first level and I couldn't stop smiling! This fluffy creature is so cute and adorable! The graphics are beyond belief as well. I have the Samsung Galaxy Note 3, so not only do I have a big screen to play on...Full ReviewWhen I first opened the game I could tell that it was going to be good. I started playing the first level and I couldn't stop smiling! This fluffy creature is so cute and adorable! The graphics are beyond belief as well. I have the Samsung Galaxy Note 3, so not only do I have a big screen to play on, I have the latest graphics which makes this game incredibly realistic. Love it, and it's definitely worth the money! Hope you enjoy! :)

Amazing This is how a game is supposed to be. Mobile gaming has never, ever, been better. This game has a nice learning curve, and gradually becomes harder to master.  The music sets an atmosphere truly worth mentioning! The graphics are stunning to watch. The most amazing part are the main character, Leopo...Full ReviewThis is how a game is supposed to be. Mobile gaming has never, ever, been better. This game has a nice learning curve, and gradually becomes harder to master.  The music sets an atmosphere truly worth mentioning! The graphics are stunning to watch. The most amazing part are the main character, Leopold. He has his own personality that you get to know. Thanks a lot to the developers, you have set the bar for mobile gaming. Again, this is truly amazing! Thank you for letting me have this experience.

Best that I had ever played The best game that I had ever played in mobile. I would have rated high but game is too small. It is super addictive untill game completes. Not worthy, can't even play for at least a week. Apart from game length,  graphics and sounds are awesome. It never lags or drains battery even though it render...Full ReviewThe best game that I had ever played in mobile. I would have rated high but game is too small. It is super addictive untill game completes. Not worthy, can't even play for at least a week. Apart from game length,  graphics and sounds are awesome. It never lags or drains battery even though it renders on my 1080p display. Thanks a lot for this creation but expecting more.

Best Game I played 2014 I was skeptical to downloading at first thinking that I might not like the game, but after reading all of the great comments I gave it a shot. The music, graphics, everthing is phonoimal.  This game is so much fun to play. After I downloaded it, I played it until 3 am. In the morning. Leo makes you ...Full ReviewI was skeptical to downloading at first thinking that I might not like the game, but after reading all of the great comments I gave it a shot. The music, graphics, everthing is phonoimal.  This game is so much fun to play. After I downloaded it, I played it until 3 am. In the morning. Leo makes you laugh. If I could give this game 10 STARS I would.  That is how much I love it. Believe me, it is well worth the money. The game has 19 changling levels. If you die you do not have to start at the beginning. You start where you died at. This is what makes the game fun. You have not seen graphics like this in any game. They are the best. GET THE GAME :)

author_name: iam jacks complete lack of surprise

Its a very causal game but with clever puzzles and a pixar like simple story but elegant non the less.  Iv downloaded going on 70 different apps haf of thoes were probly games and mostly I get ride of them in a week or never play them but this is the only review iv ever written. BTW if you haven't watched the trailer video in the app store do so. The first half is pretty amazing. Good job guys, well made game. Keep up the good work.

Glad I bought this The design and intuitive gameplay of this game is well worth the price. Fantastic. Love the small things the creators have done to make this game more fun and thoughtful than others.  There are beautiful backgrounds throughout and the style of the game is exactly what I've been looking for. Plus, th...Full ReviewThe design and intuitive gameplay of this game is well worth the price. Fantastic. Love the small things the creators have done to make this game more fun and thoughtful than others.  There are beautiful backgrounds throughout and the style of the game is exactly what I've been looking for. Plus, there's a sweet mustache on a cool, refined,  fluffball. Makes me laugh.

Best game I've seen in over a year! This game looks amazing and plays so smooth. Theres a super original story that's awesome. It's refreshingly difficult. I was so sick of the 10000 versions of the same 6 games out there. There really isn't a better new game available. I'm so glad I wasn't scared off by the $5 price tag. And bonus, I...Full ReviewThis game looks amazing and plays so smooth. Theres a super original story that's awesome. It's refreshingly difficult. I was so sick of the 10000 versions of the same 6 games out there. There really isn't a better new game available. I'm so glad I wasn't scared off by the $5 price tag. And bonus, I.A.P's aren't even an option. Can't wait to see what their 2nd project is like. You ROCK 1337 & SERNI LLC!!!

Great game and graphics, but too short Excellent game, excellent visuals, excellent controls. What's not so excellent is I paid $5 for a game I easily beat within a matter of 2 hours. I'm hoping you'll be adding more stories in future updates. If they're added in a second game and not adding into the one I bought, I will not be buying it

Awesome game but... This game has amazing graphics, enough complexity to make it addicting but not frustrating, and you just have fun while you play it. However, I truly wish I could take advantage of my tablet's screen. This game is not compatible with the LG G Pad 8.3. However, I truly wish I could take advantage of my tablet's screen. This game is not compatible with the LG G Pad 8.3. I sent an email to support about it but have not heard back from them, yet...

Awesome! Do not waste one more penny on another game. You download this now! It is a steal at 5 bucks. The controls are so much fun. The graphics are fantastic. Leo is adorable and sounds like "the most interesting man in the world." I expect him to pop open a beer at any moment. Forget the money grubbing in...Full ReviewDo not waste one more penny on another game. You download this now! It is a steal at 5 bucks. The controls are so much fun. The graphics are fantastic. Leo is adorable and sounds like "the most interesting man in the world." I expect him to pop open a beer at any moment. Forget the money grubbing in app purchase games! You can have a REAL game instead.

Amazing I can't rate this highly enough. The controls are leaps and bounds above other mobile platformers. They almost felt as tight as a console, which I didn't know was possible on a touch screen. The level design is great. I only wish the game was longer (I blasted through the whole thing in a few hours)...Full ReviewI can't rate this highly enough. The controls are leaps and bounds above other mobile platformers. They almost felt as tight as a console, which I didn't know was possible on a touch screen. The level design is great. I only wish the game was longer (I blasted through the whole thing in a few hours). This game is reminiscent of the Donkey Kong series, which I would argue is one of the gold standards in platforming. Worth the purchase.

I love this game! If you're a fan of side scrollers like Super Mario and Pitfall, you're going to be floored at how much fun you're going to have with Leo's Fortune!   Not to mention, this game is incredibly beautiful!  Playing it on an HD Tablet will blow your mind - the music is also fantastic.  I hope you have as ...Full ReviewIf you're a fan of side scrollers like Super Mario and Pitfall, you're going to be floored at how much fun you're going to have with Leo's Fortune!   Not to mention, this game is incredibly beautiful!  Playing it on an HD Tablet will blow your mind - the music is also fantastic.  I hope you have as much of a blast with this one as I have.

Consistent enjoyable quality This is one of the best games I've ever come across. With beautiful environment graphics and sound, realistic physics, appealing voice character with an European accent - which gives the game a more mysterious 'atmosphere'. The UI is simplistic and fully transparent, so that it doesn't interfere wit...Full ReviewThis is one of the best games I've ever come across. With beautiful environment graphics and sound, realistic physics, appealing voice character with an European accent - which gives the game a more mysterious 'atmosphere'. The UI is simplistic and fully transparent, so that it doesn't interfere with the beautifully crafted game, and gives the user a pleasant user interface experience. However, the story comes out rather short, and I hope the game will expand through updates, similar to "Granny Smith".

Good all around game I really like Leo's fortune the voice acting is great and the visuals are the best I've seen in a mobile game. However, I don't feel any want whatsoever to replay the levels to try for a higher score. Also from what I can tell it is a very short game. It's good.. just not great.

Such a great game I normally wouldn't spend the money for a game on my phone but decided to give it a try after reading some reviews on here. I just bought the LG G3 and wanted a game that had amazing graphics to play on this high res screen and this game delivers. Its fun, entertaining and looks beautiful. Worthy of...Full ReviewI normally wouldn't spend the money for a game on my phone but decided to give it a try after reading some reviews on here. I just bought the LG G3 and wanted a game that had amazing graphics to play on this high res screen and this game delivers. Its fun, entertaining and looks beautiful. Worthy of the $5.

Mohit Mathur I have never seen such exemplary visual effects in a mobile gaming platform. This is a flabbergasting game. Runs smoothly on a Moto G. It isn't very hard or too easy, it is apt as a player has to think about the move, this isn't just a run around kind of a game.  Full marks to game.

Great game First time I spent money on a mobile game and I did so because of the graphics and game play that I had seen... Well worth it. In response to the one star Musselwhite comment about closing the game... It's not obvious but actually well done: you have to swipe from the right edge to get the home,  ba...Full ReviewFirst time I spent money on a mobile game and I did so because of the graphics and game play that I had seen... Well worth it. In response to the one star Musselwhite comment about closing the game... It's not obvious but actually well done: you have to swipe from the right edge to get the home,  back and applications buttons. If you are on a phone with no physical home button, you can be at a loss if you don't know how to access these functions as you are used to in other apps.

Excellent Best game ever I played in my life, breathtaking graphics responsive controls, unbelievable trailer how these handmade machines works, really like the modle. And 1 star is missing because new icon is totally worst, but I like the previous icon :(

One of the best games ever Definitely deserves five stars. The graphics are amazing and the story is exciting. I love solving the puzzles and racing around as a giant puff ball! I did notice the background glitches on certain areas. Other than that its perfect :-)

Straight Up Adorbs An adorable little fuzzball welcomes you into his seemingly charming world. However, the charm hides a darker side: dank, mechanical underground puzzles shift the feel of the game to a more depressing tone, but not enough to change your overall impression of the game. It's sweet, fun, and very uniqu...Full ReviewAn adorable little fuzzball welcomes you into his seemingly charming world. However, the charm hides a darker side: dank, mechanical underground puzzles shift the feel of the game to a more depressing tone, but not enough to change your overall impression of the game. It's sweet, fun, and very unique. The physics are functional and the puzzles are approachable without being too easy. In short: enjoy!

Among the best I rarely pay for games, and my gut feeling was right on Leo's Fortune. Superbly smooth controls, beautiful graphics, fun voice for Leo, and really, that trailer! The effort these devs put into their trailer is indicative of the hard work they put into this game. Watch it, buy it, enjoy!

Boyfriend's 6 year old & I love Leo's Fortune! Beautifully illustrated platform game. We play on the HP Slate21 (desktop size tablet) and have tons of fun exploring Leo's saga. Our 6 yr/old finds it challenging but comes back time & time again to succeed. (YouTube level cheats help out!) The soundtrack makes for a calm backdrop, and the game-pla...Full ReviewBeautifully illustrated platform game. We play on the HP Slate21 (desktop size tablet) and have tons of fun exploring Leo's saga. Our 6 yr/old finds it challenging but comes back time & time again to succeed. (YouTube level cheats help out!) The soundtrack makes for a calm backdrop, and the game-play encourages (demands) pauses and the use of timing so that speed is not always favorable. Worth the 5 bucks.

Awesome! Really impressive game. Very worth the price! Was a little worried about buying a $5 app but the ratings were high and I am glad I took the chance! *side note* Game was a tad sluggish until I switched to button controls. Now smooth gameplay with no issues.

Looks good. Plays betters Leo's Fortune is an excellent example of modern mobile gaming. At this price, it's never going to match console platformers for length, but what you do get is good value for money. As well as being well presented and quite funny, it also provides a decent challenge. And if you suck at platform games...Full ReviewLeo's Fortune is an excellent example of modern mobile gaming. At this price, it's never going to match console platformers for length, but what you do get is good value for money. As well as being well presented and quite funny, it also provides a decent challenge. And if you suck at platform games as much as I do, you'll be glad to know it's very forgiving when it comes to putting you back in the game when you die; you won't find yourself right at the start of the level or anything like that.   There are also no in-app purchases, so pay once and you get the whole game. No micro-transaction rip-offs here.   Oh, and it's compatible with the Moga Pro Power (in HID mode) and probably other controllers, so you don't have to rely on touch controls.

Great game, no IAP rubbish A lovely little game that will have you ripping your hair out at times. Don't give in! Don't throw your phone under a train! It is all possible. And no in-app purchase crap. Support this developer!

Great control system This game stands out as one of the best offerings android has and is my current favorite. What sets it apart, besides the lush graphics and fun (but not annoying) sound effects, is the system for controlling your character on screen. Most games are over simplified or major fails, this game is the ex...Full ReviewThis game stands out as one of the best offerings android has and is my current favorite. What sets it apart, besides the lush graphics and fun (but not annoying) sound effects, is the system for controlling your character on screen. Most games are over simplified or major fails, this game is the exception. While it is definitely easier to play on a tablet, even the screen on my Samsung S4 mini is totally adequate, and Leo's Fortune is fun in short bursts on the bus & longer sessions on the plane.

Great story, great game play I couldn't put this game down. The story, the graphics, the voice acting, everything is engaging. The controls take a level or 2 to get used to but after that they felt natural. I like the slide controls which work perfect for mobile. Worth every penny.

Best Android Platformer Ever! I stumbled across this game and was immediately intrigued. I VERY rarely pay for any apps on my device, let alone a game and I never pay more then $2. Solid, but nothing exceptional. Once you get past the gorgeous graphics and high production values you are left with a fairly conventional platformer. The default touch controls (which I used for my playthrough) work well enough but are imprecise. Which can very quickly cause frustration when you are trying to achieve a three star...Full ReviewOnce you get past the gorgeous graphics and high production values you are left with a fairly conventional platformer. The default touch controls (which I used for my playthrough) work well enough but are imprecise. Which can very quickly cause frustration when you are trying to achieve a three star rating on the levels. The game is also entirely too short for its price. I have no qualms paying for premium games, I much prefer it over the horrible freemium model, but this left me feeling a bit ripped off.

Briliant I used to be addicted to gaming but quit completely some months ago. Not a single game on my desktop pc, nor on my mobile phone. Up untill this moment.. When I stumbled upon this game! Good graphics, good sounds, no lags. Provides an overall intresting refreshing feeling. Runs smooth on my Moto G (C...Full ReviewI used to be addicted to gaming but quit completely some months ago. Not a single game on my desktop pc, nor on my mobile phone. Up untill this moment.. When I stumbled upon this game! Good graphics, good sounds, no lags. Provides an overall intresting refreshing feeling. Runs smooth on my Moto G (Cyanogenmod nightly 4.4.4). I'm not a fan of writing reviews, but I think this one (even when I paid money for it) deserved one. Peace!

Incredible platformer Leo's Fortune is one of the best platformers I've ever played. Its levels are innovative and really fun. Unlike other games, when you die you don't start the level over. You always start from just about the point where you left off which eliminates the frustration factor found in other games. Plus t...Full ReviewLeo's Fortune is one of the best platformers I've ever played. Its levels are innovative and really fun. Unlike other games, when you die you don't start the level over. You always start from just about the point where you left off which eliminates the frustration factor found in other games. Plus the graphics are just simply beautiful.

Cheap I'm too cheap to pay $5 for an awesome game with absolutely no iAPs so I'll never be able to give this game 5 stars here in the review section. I much prefer to download free games which cost $100s if not more a month to be competitive in.

Brilliant I usually don't play games but thought I'd try this out after reading through the review's and have to say I've not regretted the purchase one bit. The gameplay, controls, graphics, etc.... are all just amazing. As I said, I don't play many games but out of the ones I've tried this is hands down the...Full ReviewI usually don't play games but thought I'd try this out after reading through the review's and have to say I've not regretted the purchase one bit. The gameplay, controls, graphics, etc.... are all just amazing. As I said, I don't play many games but out of the ones I've tried this is hands down the best.

Thank you for making a beautiful game WITHOUT In-App-Purchases! Runs flawlessly on Android L Developer Preview (Nexus 5).  I'm only halfway done, but this game is enormously entertaining, gorgeous, clever, and just plain well thought out.  Gameplay and controls are among the best I've seen.  Absolutely love the fact that there are no in-app purchases.  IAP has e...Full ReviewRuns flawlessly on Android L Developer Preview (Nexus 5).  I'm only halfway done, but this game is enormously entertaining, gorgeous, clever, and just plain well thought out.  Gameplay and controls are among the best I've seen.  Absolutely love the fact that there are no in-app purchases.  IAP has essentially destroyed mobile gaming for me, so this is a breath of fresh air.  It's worth the $5, just buy it.
